name: sengp
description: SEN GP - Plateforme de gestion des colis au Sénégal
author: SEN GP Team

scripts.build: mkdir -p www && cp *.html www/ && cp -r im www/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build:all: npm run build && cd backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.cap:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.cap:android: npm run cap:sync && npx cap open android
scripts.cap:ios: npm run cap:sync && npx cap open ios
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd backend && npm install && npm run build
